con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Environment" value="Default"/> <con:entry key="Global Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestSuite" value="Statistics"/> <con:entry key="Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestRunner Path" value=""/> <con:entry key="Tool Args" value=""/> <con:entry key="Ignore Errors" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Host:Port" value=""/> <con:entry key="user-settings.xml Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="WSS Password Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save Project" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Enable UI" value="false"/> <con:entry key="System Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Domain" value=""/> <con:entry key="Coverage Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Open Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export All" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Report Format(s)" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestCase" value="Average kill distance"/> <con:entry key="Print Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Username" value=""/> <con:entry key="Root Folder" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save After" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Add Settings" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Endpoint" value=""/> <con:entry key="Select Report Type" value=""/> </xml-fragment>

con:parameter.con:name: membershipType
con:parameter.con:description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type.

con:parameter.con:name: destinyMembershipId
con:parameter.con:description: Destiny membership ID.

con:parameter.con:name: definitions
con:parameter.con:description: If False, will not return definition information.

con:resource.name: Character summary
con:resource.con:description: Returns a character summary for the supplied membership.

con:parameter.con:name: characterId
con:parameter.con:description: ID of the character.

con:method.name: GetCharacterProgression
con:method.con:description: Provides the progression details for the supplied character.

con:parameter.con:name: itemInstanceId
con:parameter.con:description: The Instance ID of the destiny item. Not the Reference ID, pay attention.

con:method.name: GetItemDetail
con:method.con:description: Retrieve the details of a Destiny Item.

con:method.name: GetCharacterInventory
con:method.con:description: Returns the inventory for the supplied character.

con:method.name: GetCharacterActivities
con:method.con:description: Retrieve the activity for the supplied character.

con:method.name: GetDestinyAccountSummary
con:method.con:description: Returns Destiny account summary information for the supplied membership.

con:method.name: GetTriumphs
con:method.con:description: Provides Triumphs for a given Destiny account.

con:method.name: GetAccount
con:method.con:description: Returns Destiny account information for the supplied membership.

con:parameter.con:name: count
con:parameter.con:description: Number of rows to return.

con:parameter.con:name: page
con:parameter.con:description: Page number to return, starting with 0.

con:parameter.con:name: name
con:parameter.con:description: Name of items to return (partial match, no case). Omit for all items.

con:parameter.con:name: order
con:parameter.con:description: Item property used for sorting.

con:parameter.con:name: orderstathash
con:parameter.con:description: This value is used when the order parameter is set to ItemStatHash. The item stat for the provided hash value will be used in the sort.

con:parameter.con:name: definitions
con:parameter.con:description: Indicates the item definitions should be returned with item hash results.

con:parameter.con:name: step
con:parameter.con:description: Hash ID of the talent node step that an item must have in order to be returned.

con:parameter.con:name: categories
con:parameter.con:description: Category identifiers. Only items that are in all of the passed-in categories will be returned.

con:parameter.con:name: rarity
con:parameter.con:description: Rarity of items to return. Omit for all items.

con:parameter.con:name: weaponPerformance
con:parameter.con:description: Items must have node steps in one of these categories, omit for all items.

con:parameter.con:name: impactEffects
con:parameter.con:description: Items must have node steps in one of these categories, omit for all items.

con:parameter.con:name: guardianAttributes
con:parameter.con:description: Items must have node steps in one of these categories, omit for all items.

con:parameter.con:name: lightAbilities
con:parameter.con:description: Items must have node steps in one of these categories, omit for all items.

con:parameter.con:name: damageTypes
con:parameter.con:description: Items must have node steps in one of these categories, omit for all items.

con:parameter.con:name: sourcecat
con:parameter.con:description: Items must drop from the specified source category, omit for all items.

con:parameter.con:name: sourcehash
con:parameter.con:description: Items must drop from the specified source, omit for all items. Overrides sourcecat.

con:parameter.con:name: matchrandomsteps
con:parameter.con:description: True if the supplied groups/step hash filters should match random node steps. False indicates the item can always get the step before it is considered a match.

con:method.name: GetDestinyExplorerItems
con:method.con:description: Gets a page list of Destiny items.

con:parameter.con:name: guardianAttributes
con:parameter.con:description: Node steps in one of these categories, omit for all steps.

con:parameter.con:name: count
con:parameter.con:description: Number of rows to return.

con:parameter.con:name: direction
con:parameter.con:description: Order to sort steps (by name).

con:parameter.con:name: impactEffects
con:parameter.con:description: Node steps in one of these categories, omit for all steps.

con:parameter.con:name: definitions
con:parameter.con:description: Indicates the step definitions should be returned with item hash results.

con:parameter.con:name: page
con:parameter.con:description: Page number to return, starting with 0.

con:method.name: GetDestinyExplorerTalentNodeSteps
con:method.con:description: Gets a page list of Destiny talent node steps, ordered by the step name.

con:parameter.con:name: type
con:parameter.con:description: The type of definition to return.

con:parameter.con:name: id
con:parameter.con:description: The hash ID of the definition instance.

con:method.name: GetDestinySingleDefinition
con:method.con:description: Returns the specific item from the current manifest a json object.

con:parameter.con:name: definitions
con:parameter.con:description: If true, related definitions will be returned.

con:method.name: GetDestinyManifest
con:method.con:description: Returns the current version of the manifest as a json object.

con:parameter.con:name: membershipType
con:parameter.con:description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type, or All.

con:parameter.con:name: displayName
con:parameter.con:description: The full gamertag or PSN id of the player. Spaces and case are ignored.

con:method.name: SearchDestinyPlayer
con:method.con:description: Returns a list of Destiny memberships given a full Gamertag or PSN ID.

con:method.name: GetHistoricalStatsDefinition
con:method.con:description: Gets historical stats definitions.

con:parameter.con:name: membershipType
con:parameter.con:description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type.

con:parameter.con:name: destinyMembershipId
con:parameter.con:description: The Destiny membershipId of the user to retrieve.

con:method.name: GetHistoricalStatsForAccount
con:method.con:description: Gets aggregate historical stats organized around each character for a given account.

con:parameter.con:name: groups
con:parameter.con:description: Groups of stats to include, otherwise only general stats are returned. Comma separated list is allowed.

con:parameter.con:name: membershipType
con:parameter.con:description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type.

con:parameter.con:name: destinyMembershipId
con:parameter.con:description: The Destiny membershipId of the user to retrieve.

con:parameter.con:name: characterId
con:parameter.con:description: The id of the character to retrieve. You can omit this character ID or set it to 0 to get aggregate stats across all characters.

con:method.name: GetHistoricalStats
con:method.con:description: Gets historical stats for indicated character.

con:parameter.con:name: periodType
con:parameter.con:description: Indicates a specific period type to return. Optional.

con:parameter.con:name: modes
con:parameter.con:description: Game modes to return.

con:parameter.con:name: monthstart
con:parameter.con:description: First month to return when monthly stats are requested. Use the format YYYY-MM.

con:parameter.con:name: monthend
con:parameter.con:description: Last month to return when monthly stats are requested. Use the format YYYY-MM.

con:parameter.con:name: dayend
con:parameter.con:description: Last day to return when daily stats are requested. Use the format YYYY-MM-DD.

con:parameter.con:name: daystart
con:parameter.con:description: First day to return when daily stats are requested. Use the format YYYY-MM-DD

con:parameter.con:name: groups
con:parameter.con:description: Group of stats to include, otherwise only general stats are returned. Comma separated list is allowed.

con:parameter.con:name: membershipType
con:parameter.con:description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type.

con:parameter.con:name: destinyMembershipId
con:parameter.con:description: The Destiny membershipId of the user to retrieve.

con:parameter.con:name: characterId
con:parameter.con:description: The specific character whose activities should be returned.

con:method.name: GetDestinyAggregateActivityStats
con:method.con:description: Gets all activities the character has participated in together with aggregate statistics for those activities.

con:parameter.con:name: definitions
con:parameter.con:description: Client would like activity definition returned in response.

con:parameter.con:name: membershipType
con:parameter.con:description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type.

con:parameter.con:name: destinyMembershipId
con:parameter.con:description: The Destiny membershipId of the user to retrieve.

con:parameter.con:name: characterId
con:parameter.con:description: The id of the character to retrieve.

con:method.name: GetActivityHistory
con:method.con:description: Gets activity history stats for indicated character.

con:parameter.con:name: definitions
con:parameter.con:description: True if activity definitions should be returned in response.

con:parameter.con:name: mode
con:parameter.con:description: A filter for the activity mode to be returned. None returns all activities.

con:parameter.con:name: page
con:parameter.con:description: Page number to return, starting with 0.

con:parameter.con:name: count
con:parameter.con:description: Number of rows to return

con:parameter.con:name: activityId
con:parameter.con:description: The ID of the activity whose PGCR is requested.

con:method.name: GetPostGameCarnageReport
con:method.con:description: Gets the available post game carnage report for the activity ID.

con:parameter.con:name: definitions
con:parameter.con:description: Client would like activity and weapon definitions returned in response.

con:parameter.con:name: membershipType
con:parameter.con:description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type.

con:parameter.con:name: destinyMembershipId
con:parameter.con:description: The Destiny membershipId of the user to retrieve.

con:parameter.con:name: characterId
con:parameter.con:description: The id of the character to retrieve.

con:method.name: GetUniqueWeaponHistory
con:method.con:description: Gets details about unique weapon usage, including all exotic weapons.

con:parameter.con:name: definitions
con:parameter.con:description: True if item definitions should be returned in response.

con:parameter.con:name: membershipType
con:parameter.con:description: A valid membership type.

con:parameter.con:name: membershipId
con:parameter.con:description: The membershipId of the user to retrieve.

con:parameter.con:name: flavour
con:parameter.con:description: Indicates flavour stats should be included with player card data.

con:parameter.con:name: definitions
con:parameter.con:description: Indicates the card definition should be returned when player data.

con:parameter.con:name: single
con:parameter.con:description: Indicates data for a single card should be returned.

con:method.name: GetGrimoireByMembership
con:method.con:description: Gets someone else's Grimoire.

con:method.name: GetGrimoireDefinition
con:method.con:description: Gets Grimoire definitions.

con:parameter.con:name: membershipType
con:parameter.con:description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type.

con:parameter.con:name: displayName
con:parameter.con:description: A display name meeting the parameters of display names for the specified membership type (i.e., a gamertag, or a PSN Id)

con:method.name: GetMembershipIdByDisplayName
con:method.con:description: Returns the numerical id of a player based on their display name, zero if not found.

con:parameter.con:name: ignorecase
con:parameter.con:description: Default is false when not specified. True to cause a caseless search to be used.

con:testCase.name: Statistics runner
con:testCase.con:description: Calls a test case repeatedly and creates pretty lists with statistics. The custom property "usernames" should contain a comma separated list of user names. For each name, a search is performed and the first match found will be used. If the custom property "outputfile" is set, the teardown script will try to write the results to that file. Note that any old contents will be overwritten!

con:property.con:name: usernames
con:property.con:value: marhaus, powerBlade21, eexzodia1, yo_yogesh, skyfalI_56, PurelyLevi, honsa1987, Redny, al3xan125der313, hectorkiwi
